      • setGraph

        public void setGraph(TransformationGraph graph)
        Description copied from interface: JavaRunnable
        Method which passes into transformation graph instance within which transformation will be executed.
        Since TransformationGraph singleton pattern was removed it is NO longer POSSIBLE to access graph's parameters and other elements (e.g. metadata definitions) through TransformationGraph.getIntance().
        Specified by:
        setGraph in interface JavaRunnable

      • init

        public boolean init(java.util.Properties parameters)
             throws ComponentNotReadyException
        Description copied from interface: JavaRunnable
        Initializes java class/function. This method is called only once at the beginning of transformation process. Any object allocation/initialization should happen here.
        Specified by:
        init in interface JavaRunnable
        Parameters:
        parameters - Global graph parameters and parameters defined specially for the component which calls this transformation class
        Returns:
        True if OK, otherwise False
        Throws:
        ComponentNotReadyException

      • run

        public abstract void run()
        Description copied from interface: JavaRunnable
        The core method, which holds implementation of the Java code to be run by Java Execute component.
        Specified by:
        run in interface JavaRunnable

      • free

        public void free()
        Description copied from interface: JavaRunnable
        This is de-initialization method for this graph element. All resources allocated in #init() method should be released here. This method is invoked only once at the end of element existence.
        Specified by:
        free in interface JavaRunnable
